about_the_game: Enjoy the opening level of the action platformer Kip and Odosan. The demo unlocks two levels allowing you to experience playing as the two main characters Kip and Odosan, each with very different game play styles!
detailed_description: Enjoy the opening level of the action platformer Kip and Odosan. The demo unlocks two levels allowing you to experience playing as the two main characters Kip and Odosan, each with very different game play styles!
name: Kip and Odosan Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enjoy the opening level playing as Kip, and the first Odosan level, playing as Odosan each with very different play styles.
